data.title: Lower Providence Presbyterian Church
data.meta_description: Ready to get involved with Lower Providence Presbyterian Church and learn more about the ministries and missions we serve.
data.text: Following Jesus means being “His hands and feet.” Join us as we bridge the generations, working side by side to meet the needs of our community and the world around us. We accomplish this through financial and hands-on support of our 12 Core Mission Partners as well as seasonal serving opportunities throughout the year. The Serving Team is here to help you find a way to serve that calls to you personally. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out to Rev. Cara Cavicchia at ccavicchia@lppcmin.org
